column4: maximum number of new cards to introduce in a day if available. recommended to be 10x smaller than review limit.
maximum number of cards to review in a day if available.
interval (in minutes) of the 'again' option on a new or half-learned card.
interval (in minutes) of the 'good' option on a new card and the 'hard' option on a half-learned card.
number of days before a card is reviewed after it first becomes learned.
number of days before a new card is reviewed after the 'easy' option is selected.
maximum possible interval on any option on any card
starting ease multiplier of every card. the interval of the card's 'good' option will multiply by this multipler everytime it is selected.
extra multipler to a review card's interval when the 'easy' option is selected.
multiplier multiplied to last interval of the card to obtain its 'hard' option's interval.
whether new cards show up in random order or by order of the main database.
number of times you select the 'again' option on a card before it is considered a leech and auto-suspended.

column1: review limit caps new card limit
column4: whether the review limit now limits the new card limit (e.g. if the maximum reviews are 200 and you have 190 reviews due you'll only be able to learn 10 new cards)
number of seconds the timer can run for per card.
whether to show timer display during learning sessions.
